name: Azir
title: The Emperor of the Sands
lore: Azir is a powerful Ascended being, who once was the Emperor of Shurima. Now, he seeks to restore his empire and reign over the desert sands.

abilities.name: Passive - Shurima's Legacy
abilities.description: Azir can summon the Sun Disc from the ruins of a turret, replacing it with a temporary tower.

abilities.name: Q - Conquering Sands
abilities.description: Azir commands his soldiers to dash towards a target location, damaging and slowing enemies they pass through.

abilities.name: W - Arise!
abilities.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to targets within their range.

abilities.name: E - Shifting Sands
abilities.description: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, dealing magic damage to enemies he passes through. If he hits an enemy champion, he gains a shield.

abilities.name: R - Emperor's Divide
abilities.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers that charge forward, knocking back and blocking enemies. The wall acts as a barrier, preventing enemy dashes.
